testcase.classname: Demonstration of a secure login area. Enter tomsmith for the username and SuperSecretPassword! for the password. If the information is wrong you should see error messages..
testcase.name: Correct and incorrect login credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given a user is on the website home page....................................passed When user clicks on Form Authentication.....................................passed Then user enter tomsmith and xxxx for authentication........................passed And login status is confirmed...............................................passed
